Issue.creator: nnao
Issue.summary: testAPI.sh will fail to get a query by transaction id
Issue.description: Error Cannot GET /channels/mychannel/transactions/ ... {code} testAPI.sh tries to get a transaction id using parameter expansion from MESSAGE variable. But the transaction id includes a space at the beginning. And the transaction id is used as a part of URL to query transaction. Therefore testAPI.sh will fail at get a query. >
